CustomField.description: For the setting value, this will constrain entries the valid values that can be entered. Picklist values, min/max for an integer, valid values for a string. Values in this field must be separated by a \r\n
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Specify the limits/ranges/values allowed in SettingValue__c.
Values are entered one per line with 
 between them
Integer (Min/Max) [1
10 limits value to a number from 1 to 10 inclusive]
Picklists (dropdown values) [red
 lue
blue]
CustomField.label: Setting Value Domain
